list.definition: query_result( label_join( label_replace( label_replace( label_replace( label_join( {__name__=~".*jvm_gc_count"},"connector_type",",", "__name__" ), "connector_type", "$1" , "connector_type", "aerospike.([^.]*)" ),"connector_type", "$1" ,"connector_type","(.*)_jvm_gc_count.*"),"connector_type_pfx","$1","connector_type","(.*)_.*"),"new_cluster_name", " - ", "connector_type_pfx", "cluster_name" ) )
